name: frostbitten
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
having an injury caused by severe cold, usually to your toes, fingers, ears, or nose: frostbitten fingers/toes When parts of the body are frostbitten, they become pale and blistered. See
frostbite
More examplesFewer examplesHis fingers got frostbitten because he had to take off his gloves to untie the rope.She was so badly frostbitten that doctors were left with no choice but to amputate her hands and feet.He limped into base camp with frostbitten feet.
